tr_quotes.quote: Kendini sevmek diğer tüm sevgilerin başlangıcıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Osho

tr_quotes.quote: Kişinin kendini aldatmasıydı sevmek.
tr_quotes.author: Oktay Akbal

tr_quotes.quote: Kendi kendini sevmek kuralına taparım.
tr_quotes.author: Dostoyevski

tr_quotes.quote: Sevmek, kendini vermektir.
tr_quotes.author: Fernando Pessoa

tr_quotes.quote: Kendini düşünmeden sevmek; herkesi ve her şeyi.
tr_quotes.author: Tolstoy

tr_quotes.quote: Kendini sevmek bir yüklülük göstergesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

tr_quotes.quote: Kendini sevmek diğer tüm sevgilerin başlangıcıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Osho

tr_quotes.quote: Sevmek ne mana taşıyacaktı kendini sevmedikten sonra.
tr_quotes.author: Mario Levi

tr_quotes.quote: Başka birisini sevmeden önce, kendini sevmek zo­rundasın.
tr_quotes.author: Jean M. Twenge

tr_quotes.quote: Sevmek, güzel birinde aşkı aramak değil, Bir başkasında kendini bulmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Dostoyevski

tr_quotes.quote: Kendini sevmek, ömür boyu sürecek bir aşk hikayesinin başlangıcıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

tr_quotes.quote: Kendini sevmek kendini beğenmişlik değildir. Kendini sevmek de diğerini sevmenin bir parçasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Erich Fromm

tr_quotes.quote: Sevmek, birini bulmak veya kazanmak değil. Bir başkasında kendini bulmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Emma Goldman

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk dakikalarının peşinden koş, kendini sevmek, sevilmek için zorla! Dünyada ki tek gerçek bu, gerisi anlamsız.
tr_quotes.author: Tolstoy

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan sevmek ne demek olduğunu unutuyor da beni seviyorlar diye kendini avutuyor!
tr_quotes.author: Memduh Şevket Esendal

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan birilerini sevmek ve birileri tarafından sevilmek yoluyla, kendini sevme yöntemini bulur. Birilerini sevemeyen bir insan, kendisini de doğru dürüst sevemez.
tr_quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

tr_quotes.quote: Kendini severse bir insan herkesi de sever.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kişinin kendini aldatmasıydı sevmek.
tr_quotes.author: Oktay Akbal

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan sevmeye önce kendinden başlamalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendi kendini sevmek kuralına taparım.
tr_quotes.author: Dostoyevski

tr_quotes.quote: Sevmek, kendini vermektir.
tr_quotes.author: Fernando Pessoa

tr_quotes.quote: Kendini düşünmeden sevmek; herkesi ve her şeyi.
tr_quotes.author: Tolstoy

tr_quotes.quote: Kendini sevmeyen birisi bir başkasının nasıl sevebilir ki?
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendini sevmek bir yüklülük göstergesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

tr_quotes.quote: Kendini sevmek diğer tüm sevgilerin başlangıcıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Osho

tr_quotes.quote: Sevmek ne mana taşıyacaktı kendini sevmedikten sonra.
tr_quotes.author: Mario Levi

tr_quotes.quote: Kendini sevmeyen birisinden başkasını sevmesini beklemeyin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın kendini sevmesi ne güzeldir ama abartmamak kaydıyla.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sevmek, güzel birinde aşkı aramak değil, Bir başkasında kendini bulmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Dostoyevski

tr_quotes.quote: Kendini sevmek, ömür boyu sürecek bir aşk hikayesinin başlangıcıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

tr_quotes.quote: Kendini sevmek kendini beğenmişlik değildir. Kendini sevmek de diğerini sevmenin bir parçasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Erich Fromm

tr_quotes.quote: Dostun gider, sevgilin gider, arkadaşın gider, komşun gider. Geriye bir tek sen kalırsın. Önce kendini mutlu et; sonrası sonra!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendini sevmek bencillik değildir. Kendinizi nasıl seveceğinizi öğrenene kadar bir başkasını gerçekten sevemezsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk dakikalarının peşinden koş, kendini sevmek, sevilmek için zorla! Dünyada ki tek gerçek bu, gerisi anlamsız.
tr_quotes.author: Tolstoy

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan birilerini sevmek ve birileri tarafından sevilmek yoluyla, kendini sevme yöntemini bulur. Birilerini sevemeyen bir insan, kendisini de doğru dürüst sevemez.
tr_quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

tr_quotes.quote: Sevmek, önce kendini sevmeyi öğrenmekle sonra yanındaki insanın en az senin kadar mutlu olmasını isteyebilmekle başlıyormuş.
tr_quotes.author: Kolektif

tr_quotes.quote: Bir şeyi sevmek demek, o şeyin ölümünü kendi ölümüne bağlı görmek demektir. Öyle ki kendini öldürmekle onu, onu öldürmekle kendini öldüreceğine inanmak demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Özdemir Asaf

tr_quotes.quote: Bu topraklarda kendini sevmek; aynı coğrafyayı paylaştığımız farklı din ve kökenlerden insanları da sevmek, ortak hikayelerle ağlayıp gülmek, ötekiyle tamamlanmak demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Kemal Sayar

tr_quotes.quote: Önce kendini sev, geri kalan her şey yoluna girer.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinizi sevdiğiniz gibi yiyin. Kendini seviyormuş gibi hareket et. Kendini seviyormuş gibi konuş. Kendini seviyormuş gibi davran.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Her zaman kendinle birliktesin, bu yüzden hayattan zevk alabilirsin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinizle olan ilişkiniz, sahip olduğunuz diğer tüm ilişkilerin tonunu belirliyor.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Önce kendini sev, çünkü hayatının geri kalanını onunla geçireceksin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendini sevmek, kendini sevmekle başlar, bu da kendine saygı duymakla başlar, kendini olumlu şekilde düşünmekle başlar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Aynada çok şey yaşamış ama ayakta kalan kişiye aşık olmaya çalışın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendini ne kadar çok seversen, o kadar az saçmalığa tahammül edersin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinizle ilgilenmeye aşık olun.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Başkasının sizi sevmesi, sizi kendinizi sevme projesinden kurtarmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ya bu yılı kendini daha çok sevmeye adadıysan?
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinize aşık olmalıyız. Kendimi sevmiyorum. Kendim için çıldırıyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Mae Batı

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinizi sevmekte iyi değilseniz, başka birine verdiğiniz zamana ve kendinize bile vermediğiniz enerjiye içerleyeceğiniz için birini sevmekte zorlanacaksınız.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendini sevmek en büyük devrimdir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Olmak istediğiniz her şey olmak için kendinize sarsılmaz bir inancınız olsun.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Aşk en büyük mucize tedavisidir. Kendimizi sevmek hayatımızda mucizeler yaratır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sen kendini sevmezsen başka kimse seni sevmeyecek.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sen, kendin, tüm evrendeki herkes kadar senin sevgini ve şefkatini hak ediyorsun.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sevme yeteneğiniz varsa, önce kendinizi sevin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sevgiyi koşulsuz olarak kendinize vererek gösterin. Ve yaptığınız gibi, sizi koşulsuz sevecek başkalarını da hayatınıza çekeceksiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sınırlar koyacak kadar kendinizi sevin. Zamanınız ve enerjiniz çok değerli. Nasıl kullanacağınızı siz seçersiniz. Neyi kabul edip etmeyeceğinize karar vererek insanlara size nasıl davranacaklarını öğretirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Anna Taylor

tr_quotes.quote: Öz bakım asla bencil bir davranış değildir – sahip olduğum tek armağanın, başkalarına sunmak için dünyaya konduğum armağanın iyi bir şekilde yönetilmesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

en_quotes.quote: Beauty has so many forms, and I think the most beautiful thing is confidence and loving yourself
en_quotes.author: Kiesza

en_quotes.quote: I think every single imperfection adds to your beauty. I'd rather be imperfect than perfect
en_quotes.author: Sonam Kapoor

en_quotes.quote: No beauty shines brighter than that of a good heart
en_quotes.author: Shanina Shaik

en_quotes.quote: Beauty ain't always a little, cute colored flower. Beauty is anything where people be like, 'Damn.'
en_quotes.author: Prodigy

en_quotes.quote: Beauty of expression is so akin to the voice of the sea
en_quotes.author: George Matthew Adams

en_quotes.quote: To me, beauty is natural beauty. If you're naturally yourself, you're beautiful
en_quotes.author: Young M.A

en_quotes.quote: Makeup is not a mask that covers up your beauty; it's a weapon that helps you express who you are from the inside
en_quotes.author: Michelle Phan

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is being comfortable and confident in your own skin
en_quotes.author: Iman

en_quotes.quote: The beauty of mathematics only shows itself to more patient followers
en_quotes.author: Maryam Mirzakhani

en_quotes.quote: Look after yourself from within, and your beauty will shine through on your skin
en_quotes.author: Shanina Shaik

en_quotes.quote: Our hearts were drunk with a beauty Our eyes could never see
en_quotes.author: George William Russell

en_quotes.quote: True beauty is born through our actions and aspirations and in the kindness we offer to others
en_quotes.author: Alek Wek

en_quotes.quote: Education is the best friend. An educated person is respected everywhere. Education beats the beauty and the youth
en_quotes.author: Chanakya

en_quotes.quote: The beauty of a woman is not in the clothes she wears, the figure that she carries or the way she combs her hair
en_quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

en_quotes.quote: Beauty means expression and being your most authentic self
en_quotes.author: Paloma Elsesser

en_quotes.quote: The beauty of my journey is that it's always been pretty unpredictable, so stay tuned
en_quotes.author: Andreja Pejic

en_quotes.quote: Beauty of whatever kind, in its supreme development, invariably excites the sensitive soul to tears
en_quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

en_quotes.quote: There is beauty and humility in imperfection
en_quotes.author: Guillermo del Toro

en_quotes.quote: He who marvels at the beauty of the world in summer will find equal cause for wonder and admiration in winter
en_quotes.author: John Burroughs

en_quotes.quote: A rainbow is the product of physics working for your appreciation of beauty
en_quotes.author: Kyle Hill

en_quotes.quote: Beauty when unadorned is adorned the most
en_quotes.author: St. Jerome

en_quotes.quote: Perhaps the mission of an artist is to interpret beauty to people - the beauty within themselves
en_quotes.author: Langston Hughes

en_quotes.quote: Beauty and the devil are the same thing
en_quotes.author: Robert Mapplethorpe

en_quotes.quote: A thing of beauty is a joy forever: its loveliness increases; it will never pass into nothingness
en_quotes.author: John Keats

en_quotes.quote: The beauty is that through disappointment you can gain clarity, and with clarity comes conviction and true originality
en_quotes.author: Conan O'Brien

en_quotes.quote: No eyes that have seen beauty ever lose their sight
en_quotes.author: Jean Toomer

en_quotes.quote: Every flaw, scar, or mark you may have adds to your beauty
en_quotes.author: Raheem DeVaughn

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is about what's inside us, loving who we are and nurturing that. Outward beauty can really blossom from there
en_quotes.author: Connie Britton

en_quotes.quote: To me, beauty and makeup and color is like the finishing touch on everything
en_quotes.author: Marc Jacobs

en_quotes.quote: Nail polish is like the icing on the beauty cake
en_quotes.author: Mary Helen Bowers

en_quotes.quote: Art is beauty, the perpetual invention of detail, the choice of words, the exquisite care of execution
en_quotes.author: Theophile Gautier

en_quotes.quote: Beauty surrounds us, but usually we need to be walking in a garden to know it
en_quotes.author: Rumi

en_quotes.quote: Youth is happy because it has the ability to see beauty. Anyone who keeps the ability to see beauty never grows old
en_quotes.author: Franz Kafka

en_quotes.quote: I have often said that the lure of flying is the lure of beauty
en_quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

en_quotes.quote: Beauty without grace is the hook without the bait
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Cherish sunsets, wild creatures and wild places. Have a love affair with the wonder and beauty of the earth
en_quotes.author: Stewart Udall

en_quotes.quote: I always loved aesthetics. Not particularly fashion, but an idea of beauty
en_quotes.author: Miuccia Prada

en_quotes.quote: Natural beauty takes at least two hours in front of a mirror
en_quotes.author: Pamela Anderson

en_quotes.quote: Green Garden' is about beauty and joy and lush green and dance and excitement and smiling from within
en_quotes.author: Laura Mvula

en_quotes.quote: I find beauty in imperfection
en_quotes.author: Rachel Morrison

en_quotes.quote: Since love grows within you, so beauty grows. For love is the beauty of the soul
en_quotes.author: Saint Augustine

en_quotes.quote: Beauty in things exists in the mind which contemplates them
en_quotes.author: David Hume

en_quotes.quote: Glamour comes from within. My beauty regime begins with my personality
en_quotes.author: Barry Humphries

en_quotes.quote: The beauty we love is very silent. It smiles softly to itself, but never speaks
en_quotes.author: Richard Le Gallienne

en_quotes.quote: A horse is a thing of beauty... none will tire of looking at him as long as he displays himself in his splendor
en_quotes.author: Xenophon

en_quotes.quote: By plucking her petals, you do not gather the beauty of the flower
en_quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

en_quotes.quote: Everyday life is like programming, I guess. If you love something you can put beauty into it
en_quotes.author: Donald Knuth

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is truth, truth beauty,' - that is all ye know on earth, and all ye need to know
en_quotes.author: John Keats

en_quotes.quote: Today I see beauty everywhere I go, in every face I see, in every single soul
en_quotes.author: Kevyn Aucoin

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is a short-lived tyranny
en_quotes.author: Socrates

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is how you feel inside, and it reflects in your eyes. It is not something physical
en_quotes.author: Sophia Loren

en_quotes.quote: I think Sydney has so much natural beauty; it's just a beautiful city
en_quotes.author: Flume

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is perfect in its imperfections, so you just have to go with the imperfections
en_quotes.author: Diane von Furstenberg

en_quotes.quote: Mozart's music is so pure and beautiful that I see it as a reflection of the inner beauty of the universe
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: Art can never exist without naked beauty displayed
en_quotes.author: William Blake

en_quotes.quote: There's beauty in imperfection
en_quotes.author: Kirti Kulhari

en_quotes.quote: I think there are very few people who have a real style, a real personality, and real beauty
en_quotes.author: Marisa Berenson

en_quotes.quote: Beauty doesn't need ornaments. Softness can't bear the weight of ornaments
en_quotes.author: Munshi Premchand

en_quotes.quote: I'm not ugly, but my beauty is a total creation
en_quotes.author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

en_quotes.quote: There are elements of intrinsic beauty in the simplification of a house built on the log cabin idea
en_quotes.author: Gustav Stickley

en_quotes.quote: Love is the beauty of the soul
en_quotes.author: Saint Augustine

en_quotes.quote: I really do believe that inner beauty is so much more than any kind of outer beauty
en_quotes.author: Rachele Brooke Smith

en_quotes.quote: Secrecy is the element of all goodness; even virtue, even beauty is mysterious
en_quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

en_quotes.quote: For me, physical beauty is never the reason for attraction to anyone
en_quotes.author: Katrina Kaif

en_quotes.quote: I'm constantly trying to redefine what being a beauty queen is
en_quotes.author: Catriona Gray

en_quotes.quote: My beauty icon is the love between my mother and father
en_quotes.author: Stella Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: Flowers... are a proud assertion that a ray of beauty outvalues all the utilities of the world
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Light, God's eldest daughter, is a principal beauty in a building
en_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is a radiance that originates from within and comes from inner security and strong character
en_quotes.author: Jane Seymour

en_quotes.quote: The absence of flaw in beauty is itself a flaw
en_quotes.author: Havelock Ellis

en_quotes.quote: To me, teamwork is the beauty of our sport, where you have five acting as one. You become selfless
en_quotes.author: Mike Krzyzewski

en_quotes.quote: To me, 'sexy' is a kind of beauty, a kind of self-expression, one that is to be celebrated
en_quotes.author: Emily Ratajkowski

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is but a flower, which wrinkles will devour
en_quotes.author: Thomas Nashe

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is the bait which with delight allures man to enlarge his kind
en_quotes.author: Socrates

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is everywhere a welcome guest
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: Somehow a bachelor never quite gets over the idea that he is a thing of beauty and a boy forever
en_quotes.author: Helen Rowland

en_quotes.quote: Solitude has its own very strange beauty to it
en_quotes.author: Liv Tyler

en_quotes.quote: Love of beauty is taste. The creation of beauty is art
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: I would like to say to people, open your eyes and find beauty where you normally don't expect it
en_quotes.author: Jean Paul Gaultier

en_quotes.quote: I'm no natural beauty. If I'm gonna have any looks at all, I'm gonna have to create them
en_quotes.author: Dolly Parton

en_quotes.quote: You have to spend some energy and effort to see the beauty of math
en_quotes.author: Maryam Mirzakhani

en_quotes.quote: I think there's so much honor and integrity and beauty in being able to be who you are
en_quotes.author: Sara Bareilles

en_quotes.quote: Beauty, to me, is kind, generous, and people that are humble
en_quotes.author: Nikki Sixx

en_quotes.quote: I always find beauty in things that are odd and imperfect - they are much more interesting
en_quotes.author: Marc Jacobs

en_quotes.quote: Well I do find the beauty in animals. I find beauty everywhere. I find beauty in my garden
en_quotes.author: Doris Day

en_quotes.quote: I don't have any beauty shop memories. I remember the barber shop
en_quotes.author: Jenifer Lewis

en_quotes.quote: I always say that kindness is the greatest beauty that you can have
en_quotes.author: Andie MacDowell

en_quotes.quote: I have always known what I wanted, and that was beauty... in every form
en_quotes.author: Joan Crawford

en_quotes.quote: I never thought of becoming an actress, but I always dreamt of winning a beauty pageant, and I achieved that
en_quotes.author: Urvashi Rautela

en_quotes.quote: I consider myself a woman endowed with inner beauty
en_quotes.author: Leila Lopes

en_quotes.quote: The difference between utility and utility plus beauty is the difference between telephone wires and the spider web
en_quotes.author: Edwin Way Teale

en_quotes.quote: If the path be beautiful, let us not ask where it leads
en_quotes.author: Anatole France

en_quotes.quote: She got her looks from her father. He's a plastic surgeon
en_quotes.author: Groucho Marx

en_quotes.quote: Being a beauty queen was never on my radar
en_quotes.author: Catriona Gray

en_quotes.quote: Find your own way, have an open spirit, and believe in your own beauty
en_quotes.author: Francois Nars

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is eternity gazing at itself in a mirror
en_quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: I would never like to endorse a fairness cream. I believe in natural beauty
en_quotes.author: Esha Gupta

en_quotes.quote: Personal beauty is a greater recommendation than any letter of reference
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: I like beauty to be a bit edgy, not typical. For me, the only rule is looking good
en_quotes.author: Francois Nars

en_quotes.quote: True beauty is when someone radiates that they like themselves
en_quotes.author: Aimee Mullins

en_quotes.quote: Natural beauty really entices men. They will tell you this time and time again, and studies consistently prove it
en_quotes.author: Helen Fisher

en_quotes.quote: As we grow old, the beauty steals inward
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: What would be ugly in a garden constitutes beauty in a mountain
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: Through my optimism I naturally prefer and capture the beauty in life
en_quotes.author: Leni Riefenstahl

en_quotes.quote: The beauty of having short hair is that I actually can wash and style it at home!
en_quotes.author: Meagan Good

en_quotes.quote: Beauty without expression is boring
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Both for Havana's beauty and decay, it's very hard to restrain yourself from staring everywhere you look
en_quotes.author: Brin-Jonathan Butler

en_quotes.quote: I don't think of all the misery but of the beauty that still remains
en_quotes.author: Anne Frank

en_quotes.quote: The human soul needs actual beauty more than bread
en_quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

en_quotes.quote: There is a kind of beauty in imperfection
en_quotes.author: Conrad Hall

en_quotes.quote: I've learned that when God promises beauty through the ashes, He means it
en_quotes.author: Taya Kyle

en_quotes.quote: There is no real beauty without some slight imperfection
en_quotes.author: James Salter

en_quotes.quote: Beauty should not be culturally relevant; it should be universal
en_quotes.author: Alek Wek

en_quotes.quote: Beauty has a lot to do with character
en_quotes.author: Kevyn Aucoin

en_quotes.quote: The beauty of an art project is that you cannot always measure the impact, but one day it can become clear
en_quotes.author: JR

en_quotes.quote: Zest is the secret of all beauty. There is no beauty that is attractive without zest
en_quotes.author: Christian Dior

en_quotes.quote: Virtue has a veil, vice a mask
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: The moment you cheat for the sake of beauty, you know you're an artist
en_quotes.author: David Hockney

en_quotes.quote: A sculptor wields The chisel, and the stricken marble grows To beauty
en_quotes.author: William Cullen Bryant

en_quotes.quote: It is not sufficient to see and to know the beauty of a work. We must feel and be affected by it
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: Inner beauty radiates from within, and there's nothing more beautiful than when a woman feels beautiful on the inside
en_quotes.author: Erin Heatherton

en_quotes.quote: Beauty may be skin deep, but ugly goes clear to the bone
en_quotes.author: Redd Foxx

en_quotes.quote: It's nice to just embrace the natural beauty within you
en_quotes.author: Victoria Justice

en_quotes.quote: My mama told me in college, 'I love you, and you're God's child, but natural beauty will only take you so far.'
en_quotes.author: Robin Roberts

en_quotes.quote: I find beauty in the grotesque, like most artists
en_quotes.author: Alexander McQueen

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is not caused. It is
en_quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

en_quotes.quote: My favourite beauty look is definitely '70s beauty - sun kissed skin, wavy hair and defined eyes
en_quotes.author: Erin Heatherton

en_quotes.quote: Integrity reveals beauty
en_quotes.author: Thomas Leonard

en_quotes.quote: When everything else physical and mental seems to diminish, the appreciation of beauty is on the increase
en_quotes.author: Bernard Berenson

en_quotes.quote: Do we have to be rail thin to possess 'outer beauty' and sex appeal and to be capable of attracting lovers?
en_quotes.author: Allison Anders

en_quotes.quote: Beauty lasts five minutes. Maybe longer if you have a good plastic surgeon
en_quotes.author: Tia Carrere

en_quotes.quote: The beauty of the past belongs to the past
en_quotes.author: Margaret Bourke-White

en_quotes.quote: Faces that have charmed us the most escape us the soonest
en_quotes.author: Walter Scott

en_quotes.quote: Nonsense and beauty have close connections
en_quotes.author: E. M. Forster

en_quotes.quote: Beauty and seduction, I believe, is nature's tool for survival, because we will protect what we fall in love with
en_quotes.author: Louie Schwartzberg

en_quotes.quote: A witty woman is a treasure; a witty beauty is a power
en_quotes.author: George Meredith

en_quotes.quote: Being proud of who we are as people is more important than cutting into ourselves to create this false idea of beauty
en_quotes.author: Isla Fisher

en_quotes.quote: In Wyoming, the beauty of our mountains is matched only by the grit of our people
en_quotes.author: Liz Cheney

en_quotes.quote: Sunscreen is my number one beauty product that goes on even when I am indoors
en_quotes.author: Liz Goldwyn

en_quotes.quote: Real beauty is to be true to oneself. That's what makes me feel good
en_quotes.author: Laetitia Casta

en_quotes.quote: Every girl should use what Mother Nature gave her before Father Time takes it away
en_quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

en_quotes.quote: I hold that the perfection of form and beauty is contained in the sum of all men
en_quotes.author: Albrecht Durer

en_quotes.quote: Sunscreen, in the world of beauty, is the ultimate in adulting
en_quotes.author: Emily Weiss

en_quotes.quote: Inner beauty should be the most important part of improving one's self
en_quotes.author: Priscilla Presley

en_quotes.quote: As a kid, I was obsessed with myths and legends and the haunting beauty of gothic stories
en_quotes.author: Nathan Parsons

en_quotes.quote: Beauty, n: the power by which a woman charms a lover and terrifies a husband
en_quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

en_quotes.quote: Let your watchword be order and your beacon beauty
en_quotes.author: Daniel Burnham

en_quotes.quote: The last thing left in nature is the beauty of women
en_quotes.author: Peter Beard

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is in the heart of the beholder
en_quotes.author: H. G. Wells

en_quotes.quote: Beauty, whether moral or natural, is felt, more properly than perceived
en_quotes.author: David Hume

en_quotes.quote: I can barely conceive of a type of beauty in which there is no Melancholy
en_quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

en_quotes.quote: I don't need plastic in my body to validate me as a woman
en_quotes.author: Courtney Love

en_quotes.quote: How goodness heightens beauty!
en_quotes.author: Milan Kundera

en_quotes.quote: I sincerely feel that beauty largely comes from within
en_quotes.author: Christy Turlington

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is only skin deep
en_quotes.author: Thomas Overbury

en_quotes.quote: A woman whose smile is open and whose expression is glad has a kind of beauty no matter what she wears
en_quotes.author: Anne Roiphe

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is not just a white girl. It's so many different flavors and shades
en_quotes.author: Queen Latifah

en_quotes.quote: Beauty always promises, but never gives anything
en_quotes.author: Simone Weil

en_quotes.quote: Alas! how little does the memory of these human inhabitants enhance the beauty of the landscape!
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: A more secret, sweet, and overpowering beauty appears to man when his heart and mind open to the sentiment of virtue
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: The reason that the all-American boy prefers beauty to brains is that he can see better than he can think
en_quotes.author: Farrah Fawcett

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is the first test: there is no permanent place in the world for ugly mathematics
en_quotes.author: G. H. Hardy

en_quotes.quote: There's a lot of beauty in the world, so go hang out and go be a part of the solution rather than the problem
en_quotes.author: Mac Miller

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is in the eye of the beer holder
en_quotes.author: Kinky Friedman

en_quotes.quote: I like a girl with natural beauty
en_quotes.author: Chandler Parsons

en_quotes.quote: I'm attracted to soccer's capacity for beauty. When well played, the game is a dance with a ball
en_quotes.author: Eduardo Galeano

en_quotes.quote: The perception of beauty is a moral test
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is only skin deep. I think what's really important is finding a balance of mind, body and spirit
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is an outward gift, which is seldom despised, except by those to whom it has been refused
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Take care of your inner, spiritual beauty. That will reflect in your face
en_quotes.author: Dolores del Rio

en_quotes.quote: She is a peacock in everything but beauty
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: Laughter and joy are part of the beauty of life
en_quotes.author: Diogo Morgado

en_quotes.quote: There is art and beauty and power in the primal images of fantasy
en_quotes.author: Guillermo del Toro

en_quotes.quote: Beauty and folly are old companions
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is all very well at first sight; but who ever looks at it when it has been in the house three days?
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is a manifestation of secret natural laws, which otherwise would have been hidden from us forever
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: What delights us in visible beauty is the invisible
en_quotes.author: Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach

en_quotes.quote: You know when I feel inwardly beautiful? When I am with my girlfriends and we are having a 'goddess circle'
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

en_quotes.quote: The beauty of democracy is that an average, random, unremarkable citizen can lead it
en_quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

en_quotes.quote: I know it sounds a bit corny, but I do think that beauty and sexiness come from within
en_quotes.author: Rachel Stevens

en_quotes.quote: The best part of beauty is that which no picture can express
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: I define nothing. Not beauty, not patriotism. I take each thing as it is, without prior rules about what it should be
en_quotes.author: Bob Dylan

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is the greatest seducer of man
en_quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

en_quotes.quote: I heard the old, old, men say 'all that's beautiful drifts away, like the waters.'
en_quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

en_quotes.quote: The seventies is what I love. Soft, touchable beauty is what I love
en_quotes.author: Tom Ford

en_quotes.quote: The fun part of being a girl is that there are little beauty things you can do to make yourself feel special
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Love Hewitt

en_quotes.quote: Exuberance is beauty
en_quotes.author: William Blake

en_quotes.quote: You're beautiful, like a May fly
en_quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

en_quotes.quote: Highlight and contour are two major steps in getting the 'perfect' beauty look
en_quotes.author: Jeffree Star

en_quotes.quote: If you get simple beauty and naught else, you get about the best thing God invents
en_quotes.author: Robert Browning

en_quotes.quote: Even though beauty is very much my heritage, my real passion is accessories and home
en_quotes.author: Aerin Lauder

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder for real
en_quotes.author: Michelle Visage

en_quotes.quote: I recognize in thieves, traitors and murderers, in the ruthless and the cunning, a deep beauty - a sunken beauty
en_quotes.author: Jean Genet

en_quotes.quote: As a girl, you're supposed to love Sleeping Beauty. I mean, who wants to love Sleeping Beauty when you can be Aladdin?
en_quotes.author: Ellen Page

en_quotes.quote: You can take no credit for beauty at sixteen. But if you are beautiful at sixty, it will be your soul's own doing
en_quotes.author: Marie Stopes

en_quotes.quote: Physical beauty isn't so impressive to me
en_quotes.author: Dita Von Teese

en_quotes.quote: Perfect is boring: Beauty is irregular
en_quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

en_quotes.quote: Cinderella is not only an iconic character when it comes to beauty, grace and fairytale love, but also shoes
en_quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

en_quotes.quote: Beauty awakens the soul to act
en_quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

en_quotes.quote: The terrifying and edible beauty of Art Nouveau architecture
en_quotes.author: Salvador Dali

en_quotes.quote: Nothing surpasses the beauty and elegance of a bad idea
en_quotes.author: Craig Bruce

en_quotes.quote: I love faces that have freckles. I love faces that have wrinkles. For me, beauty is naturalism, I guess
en_quotes.author: Rachel Morrison

en_quotes.quote: I think that with beauty, people jump to the end instead of starting from the beginning with a good lotion or prep
en_quotes.author: Kat Graham

en_quotes.quote: Wealth, beauty, and fame are transient. When those are gone, little is left except the need to be useful
en_quotes.author: Gene Tierney

en_quotes.quote: Beauty, more than bitterness, makes the heart break
en_quotes.author: Sara Teasdale

en_quotes.quote: From 'Midnight Cowboy' to 'Taxi Driver' is a brief era whose grit, beauty, and violence has been quite mythologized
en_quotes.author: Rachel Kushner

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder
en_quotes.author: Oliver Platt

en_quotes.quote: A bachelor never quite gets over the idea that he is a thing of beauty and a boy forever
en_quotes.author: Helen Rowland

en_quotes.quote: All cities are mad: but the madness is gallant. All cities are beautiful: but the beauty is grim
en_quotes.author: Christopher Morley

en_quotes.quote: For every moment of triumph, for every instance of beauty, many souls must be trampled
en_quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

en_quotes.quote: Fashion should be genderless; how people perceive the idea of beauty can vary from one to another
en_quotes.author: Alessandro Michele

en_quotes.quote: All the freaky people make the beauty of the world
en_quotes.author: Michael Franti

en_quotes.quote: Seek goodness and be goodness. Seek beauty and be beauty. Seek love and be love
en_quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

en_quotes.quote: You can't really say what is beautiful about a place, but the image of the place will remain vividly with you
en_quotes.author: Tadao Ando

en_quotes.quote: The woman with dark hair, wide hips, and a few extra pounds has always been the essence of beauty in Morocco
en_quotes.author: Fatema Mernissi

en_quotes.quote: I'm not trying to stump anybody... it's the beauty of the language that I'm interested in
en_quotes.author: Buddy Holly

en_quotes.quote: People come to see beauty, and I dance to give it to them
en_quotes.author: Judith Jamison

en_quotes.quote: I'm a little quirky, a little offbeat, and I'm certainly not a classic beauty
en_quotes.author: Ari Graynor

en_quotes.quote: I love fashion, beauty, glamour. It's the mark of civilisation
en_quotes.author: David LaChapelle

en_quotes.quote: Being happy is a beauty. It's not about having the perfect face or perfect make-up
en_quotes.author: Emily Atack

en_quotes.quote: Search for beauty without features, something deeper than any signs
en_quotes.author: Francesca da Rimini

en_quotes.quote: People don't associate red hair, pale skin, and freckles with beauty
en_quotes.author: Shirley Manson

en_quotes.quote: Most people can't see beauty and love. I see our music as medicine
en_quotes.author: Maurice White

en_quotes.quote: That's the beauty of the animation process: It takes so long, you have so many chances to improve it
en_quotes.author: Phil Lord

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is worse than wine, it intoxicates both the holder and beholder
en_quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

en_quotes.quote: I think permitting the game to become too physical takes away a little bit of the beauty
en_quotes.author: John Wooden

en_quotes.quote: Anyone who keeps the ability to see beauty never grows old
en_quotes.author: Franz Kafka

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is a fragile gift
en_quotes.author: Ovid

en_quotes.quote: So much has been said and sung of beautiful young girls, why doesn't somebody wake up to the beauty of old women
en_quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is subjective and should not be limited to only what we see on the outside
en_quotes.author: Alek Wek

en_quotes.quote: In every man's heart there is a secret nerve that answers to the vibrations of beauty
en_quotes.author: Christopher Morley

en_quotes.quote: It's important to believe in yourself and the beauty of your dreams and to not let anyone tell you different
en_quotes.author: Victoria Arlen

en_quotes.quote: There is beauty when something works and it works intuitively
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Ive

en_quotes.quote: My mother never wore much make-up, and she was a kind of natural beauty; she knew just how to enhance what she had
en_quotes.author: Francois Nars

en_quotes.quote: In life, as in art, the beautiful moves in curves
en_quotes.author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

en_quotes.quote: Rarely do great beauty and great virtue dwell together
en_quotes.author: Petrarch

en_quotes.quote: Why hurry over beautiful things? Why not linger and enjoy them?
en_quotes.author: Clara Schumann

en_quotes.quote: The beauty of a face is not a separate quality but a relation or proportion of qualities to each other
en_quotes.author: George Herbert Mead

en_quotes.quote: I needed to be in the bush. There I find solitude and beauty and purity and focus. That's where my heart lies
en_quotes.author: Mark Burnett

en_quotes.quote: I always say you can never be extravagant with beauty. Beauty is God made real. Beauty is life
en_quotes.author: Imelda Marcos

en_quotes.quote: Red lipstick has been my beauty staple for years. I show up to Pilates or yoga at 8 A.M. wearing my red lipstick
en_quotes.author: Liz Goldwyn

en_quotes.quote: With skin and beauty, it always starts from within. So I try to eat very healthy
en_quotes.author: Mia Goth

en_quotes.quote: I see flaws as a kind of beauty
en_quotes.author: Karan Mahajan

en_quotes.quote: We have to get back to the beauty of just being alive in this present moment
en_quotes.author: Mary McDonnell

en_quotes.quote: And beauty immortal awakes from the tomb
en_quotes.author: James Beattie

en_quotes.quote: With beauty, I just try to get as much sleep as possible. I might have a nice hot bath and moisturise with coconut oil
en_quotes.author: Courtney Eaton

en_quotes.quote: Beauty in distress is much the most affecting beauty
en_quotes.author: Edmund Burke

en_quotes.quote: There is no excellent beauty that hath not some strangeness in the proportion
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: I am a thing of beauty
en_quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

en_quotes.quote: It's a good thing that beauty is only skin deep, or I'd be rotten to the core
en_quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

en_quotes.quote: Great perils have this beauty, that they bring to light the fraternity of strangers
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is the sole ambition, the exclusive goal of Taste
en_quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

en_quotes.quote: I always keep a damp beauty blender and a powder compact in my purse, and I touch up a lot
en_quotes.author: Jeffree Star

en_quotes.quote: Smart beauty is about looking your best and feeling your best and never overpaying for it
en_quotes.author: Stacy London

en_quotes.quote: Heat cannot be separated from fire, or beauty from The Eternal
en_quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

en_quotes.quote: The beauty of being a curvier girl is that we're all shaped so differently
en_quotes.author: Ashley Graham

en_quotes.quote: Fast cars like Porsches and Ferraris - they are things of beauty
en_quotes.author: Rod Stewart

en_quotes.quote: For all of nature's wonder and beauty, it is also hostile and unpredictable
en_quotes.author: Liam Neeson

en_quotes.quote: Let's just say beauty inspires me. But I like all beauty - I think it really comes from the inside out
en_quotes.author: Donatella Versace

en_quotes.quote: I was not a good-lookin' girl. I was extremely skinny. I wasn't pretty. I wasn't cool
en_quotes.author: Celine Dion

en_quotes.quote: Art requires philosophy, just as philosophy requires art. Otherwise, what would become of beauty?
en_quotes.author: Paul Gauguin

en_quotes.quote: It was Chicago with its World's Fair which vivified the national desire for civic beauty
en_quotes.author: Daniel Burnham

en_quotes.quote: Beauty comes in all forms. It's not just external; it's internal as well
en_quotes.author: Alessia Cara

en_quotes.quote: All the fascination with numbers conspires to make you forget the beauty of the game sometimes
en_quotes.author: Jeff Van Gundy

en_quotes.quote: Only when inspired to go beyond consciousness by some extraordinary insight does beauty manifest unexpectedly
en_quotes.author: Arthur Erickson

en_quotes.quote: Not just as a black woman, but as a woman, since the beginning of time, beauty has been our responsibility
en_quotes.author: Nicole Ari Parker

en_quotes.quote: Beauty and brains, pleasure and usability - they should go hand in hand
en_quotes.author: Donald Norman

en_quotes.quote: If we do not permit the earth to produce beauty and joy, it will in the end not produce food, either
en_quotes.author: Joseph Wood Krutch

en_quotes.quote: To me, beauty is inclusion - every size, every color - that's the world I live in
en_quotes.author: Prabal Gurung

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is being in harmony with what you are
en_quotes.author: Peter Nivio Zarlenga

en_quotes.quote: I believe that true beauty of chess is more than enough to satisfy all possible demands
en_quotes.author: Alexander Alekhine

en_quotes.quote: The pain passes, but the beauty remains
en_quotes.author: Auguste Renoir

en_quotes.quote: Nothing can atone for the lack of modesty; without which beauty is ungraceful and wit detestable
en_quotes.author: Richard Steele

en_quotes.quote: I will admit to hoarding beauty products. I'm a beauty lady
en_quotes.author: Naya Rivera

en_quotes.quote: Beauty of mind creates freedom. Freedom of mind creates beauty
en_quotes.author: Ann Demeulemeester

en_quotes.quote: My mum is my beauty icon, because she represents what I think beauty is
en_quotes.author: Bar Refaeli

en_quotes.quote: As long as I love Beauty I am young
en_quotes.author: W. H. Davies

en_quotes.quote: It never seems to occur to some people, that, like beauty, a sense of humor may sometimes be fatal
en_quotes.author: Edgar Rice Burroughs

en_quotes.quote: Beauty comes from the inside
en_quotes.author: Kathy Ireland

en_quotes.quote: Putting beauty in your life can be an amazing therapy. I love harmonies and a good melody
en_quotes.author: Cindy Wilson

en_quotes.quote: Sleeping and water are lifesavers - that's true beauty right there
en_quotes.author: Sofia Boutella

en_quotes.quote: In beauty school, you learn etiquette
en_quotes.author: Didi Conn

en_quotes.quote: My beauty secret is really three secrets: get eight hours of sleep, eat natural/organic food, and exercise regularly
en_quotes.author: Sasha Pivovarova

en_quotes.quote: I made myself famous by writing 'songs' and lyrics about the beauty of the things I did and ugliness, too
en_quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

en_quotes.quote: The ideal beauty is a fugitive which is never found
en_quotes.author: Joan Rivers

en_quotes.quote: Beauty itself is but the sensible image of the Infinite
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: With a great poet the sense of Beauty overcomes every other consideration, or rather obliterates all consideration
en_quotes.author: John Keats

en_quotes.quote: It's not beauty but fine qualities, my girl, that keep a husband
en_quotes.author: Euripides

en_quotes.quote: The beauty of me being on stage is I have a voice
en_quotes.author: Kevin Hart

en_quotes.quote: Pay attention to the beauty surrounding you
en_quotes.author: Anne Lamott

en_quotes.quote: Love built on beauty, soon as beauty, dies
en_quotes.author: John Donne

en_quotes.quote: To love beauty is to see light
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: The beautiful seems right by force of beauty and the feeble wrong because of weakness
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

en_quotes.quote: There are as many kinds of beauty as there are habitual ways of seeking happiness
en_quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

en_quotes.quote: Grace in women has more effect than beauty
en_quotes.author: William Hazlitt

en_quotes.quote: There is no personal achievement in being born beautiful
en_quotes.author: Loretta Young

en_quotes.quote: The love of beauty in its multiple forms is the noblest gift of the human cerebrum
en_quotes.author: Alexis Carrel

en_quotes.quote: I love my beauty. It's not my fault
en_quotes.author: Valentino Garavani

en_quotes.quote: Always think of what is useful and not what is beautiful. Beauty will come of its own accord
en_quotes.author: Nikolai Gogol

en_quotes.quote: Goodness is beauty in the best estate
en_quotes.author: Christopher Marlowe

en_quotes.quote: Art evokes emotion. It doesn't have to be a thing of beauty
en_quotes.author: Eli Broad

en_quotes.quote: Let us live for the beauty of our own reality
en_quotes.author: Charles Lamb

en_quotes.quote: Beauty shouldn't be superficial and should come from within, and your eyes will tell the story
en_quotes.author: Michelle Yeoh

en_quotes.quote: I think confidence is a true form of beauty
en_quotes.author: Becky G

en_quotes.quote: I longed to arrest all beauty that came before me, and at length the longing has been satisfied
en_quotes.author: Julia Margaret Cameron

en_quotes.quote: And for me, the real world involves everything: risk, danger, beauty, energy, all we meet with in the real world
en_quotes.author: Christo

en_quotes.quote: My everyday beauty routine is always rushed and pretty simple
en_quotes.author: Cate Blanchett

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is the oracle that speaks to us all
en_quotes.author: Luis Barragan

en_quotes.quote: I'd like to see more beauty campaigns for girls who are mixed Latina and black
en_quotes.author: Joan Smalls

en_quotes.quote: For me beauty is valued more than anything - the beauty that is manifest in a curved line or in an act of creativity
en_quotes.author: Oscar Niemeyer

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is that which is simultaneously attractive and sublime
en_quotes.author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

en_quotes.quote: My duty is to try to reach beauty. Cinema is emotion. When you laugh you cry
en_quotes.author: Roberto Benigni

en_quotes.quote: We all have to find beauty within us, as opposed to just our exterior
en_quotes.author: Shay Mitchell

en_quotes.quote: For me, diverse beauty is an affirmation of every single person in his or her own skin
en_quotes.author: Philomena Kwao

en_quotes.quote: Having inner beauty is something you develop on your own, and I like to think I have that
en_quotes.author: Cindy Margolis

en_quotes.quote: Things are beautiful if you love them
en_quotes.author: Jean Anouilh

en_quotes.quote: If beauty isn't genius it usually signals at least a high level of animal cunning
en_quotes.author: Peter York

en_quotes.quote: A women's greatest asset is her beauty
en_quotes.author: Alex Comfort

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is the first present nature gives to women and the first it takes away
en_quotes.author: Fay Weldon

en_quotes.quote: Art is the unceasing effort to compete with the beauty of flowers - and never succeeding
en_quotes.author: Gian Carlo Menotti

en_quotes.quote: The original theme of 'Beauty and the Beast' is don't judge a book by its cover. Love what's inside
en_quotes.author: Jay Ryan

en_quotes.quote: Everybody know, I don't do no promoting. I don't ever have to promote nothing, that's the beauty of Lil Wayne
en_quotes.author: Lil Wayne

en_quotes.quote: A beauty is a woman you notice; a charmer is one who notices you
en_quotes.author: Adlai Stevenson I

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is whatever gives joy
en_quotes.author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

en_quotes.quote: There is nothing that makes its way more directly into the soul than beauty
en_quotes.author: Joseph Addison

en_quotes.quote: I'd like to grow up and be beautiful. I know it doesn't matter, but it doesn't hurt
en_quotes.author: Kirsten Dunst

en_quotes.quote: I also became close to nature, and am now able to appreciate the beauty with which this world is endowed
en_quotes.author: James Dean

en_quotes.quote: The problem with beauty is that it's like being born rich and getting poorer
en_quotes.author: Joan Collins

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is variable, ugliness is constant
en_quotes.author: Douglas Horton

en_quotes.quote: As soon as beauty is sought not from religion and love, but for pleasure, it degrades the seeker
en_quotes.author: Annie Dillard

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is merciless. You do not look at it, it looks at you and does not forgive
en_quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

en_quotes.quote: Like charity, I believe glamour should begin at home
en_quotes.author: Loretta Young

en_quotes.quote: As for everything else, so for a mathematical theory: beauty can be perceived but not explained
en_quotes.author: Arthur Cayley

en_quotes.quote: Order is the shape upon which beauty depends
en_quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

en_quotes.quote: Real beauty knocks you a little bit off kilter
en_quotes.author: David Byrne

en_quotes.quote: There is a role and function for beauty in our time
en_quotes.author: Tadao Ando

en_quotes.quote: It is easy to be beautiful; it is difficult to appear so
en_quotes.author: Hosea Ballou

en_quotes.quote: What beauty is, I know not, though it adheres to many things
en_quotes.author: Albrecht Durer

en_quotes.quote: The beautiful remains so in ugly surroundings
en_quotes.author: Malcolm de Chazal

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is not skin-deep; it can be a means of self-affirmation, a true indicator of personality and confidence
en_quotes.author: Aimee Mullins

en_quotes.quote: The plainer the dress, the greater luster does beauty appear
en_quotes.author: Edward Wood, 1st Earl of Halifax

en_quotes.quote: O human beauty, what a dream art thou, that we should cast our life and hopes away on thee!
en_quotes.author: Bryan Procter

en_quotes.quote: I really like where Tony Robbins says that we're all hypnotized to see beauty this one specific way, and it's true
en_quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is less important than quality
en_quotes.author: Eugene Ormandy

en_quotes.quote: Taking joy in living is a woman's best cosmetic
en_quotes.author: Rosalind Russell

en_quotes.quote: The beauty of diversification is it's about as close as you can get to a free lunch in investing
en_quotes.author: Barry Ritholtz

en_quotes.quote: Rare is the union of beauty and purity
en_quotes.author: Juvenal

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is one of the rare things which does not lead to doubt of God
en_quotes.author: Jean Anouilh

en_quotes.quote: It's amazing what sleep does for your looks
en_quotes.author: Emily Procter

en_quotes.quote: It's sad when girls think they don't have anything going on except being pretty
en_quotes.author: Keri Russell

en_quotes.quote: Social media has revolutionised how beauty is curated, captured, and consumed
en_quotes.author: Pat McGrath

en_quotes.quote: Because beauty isn't enough, there must be something more
en_quotes.author: Eva Herzigova

en_quotes.quote: You can only perceive real beauty in a person as they get older
en_quotes.author: Anouk Aimee

en_quotes.quote: Gorgeous hair is the best revenge
en_quotes.author: Ivana Trump

en_quotes.quote: Familiarity is a magician that is cruel to beauty but kind to ugliness
en_quotes.author: Ouida

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is only temporary, but your mind lasts you a lifetime
en_quotes.author: Alicia Machado

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is only skin deep, and the world is full of thin skinned people
en_quotes.author: Richard Armour

en_quotes.quote: For me the greatest beauty always lies in the greatest clarity
en_quotes.author: Gotthold Ephraim Lessing
